Description: Use the front panel for easier debugging. (Set to 2 for RS485 control)
Use the front potentiometer. (Set to 2 for RS485 control)
Max operating frequency. This setting dictates the maximum frequency limit that is used by the other frequency settings.
Base frequency. Intentionally out of numerical order.
Main frequency. Intentionally out of numerical order.
Min frequency for the VF curve.
Max output voltage for a 220V spindle.
Intermediate voltage on the VF curve.
Minimum frequency. Spindle may overheat or lose torque at lower speed.
Communication address. Matches LinuxCNC hy_vfd default.
Baud rate = 19200 bps. Must match LinuxCNC config.
Communication mode = 8N1 RTU. hy_vfd supports RTU only.
